mapper.select: SELECT DS.BOOK_CODE as bookCode, DS.TITLE as title, DS.PUBLISHER as publisher, DS.PRICE as price, DS.PAGES as pages, DS.DESCRIPTION as description, DS.STATUS as status, DS.AUTHOR as author, DS.CREATED_YEAR as createdYear, DS.CATEGORY as category, COUNT(S.book_code) AS quantity FROM DAUSACH AS DS LEFT JOIN SACH AS S ON DS.book_code = S.book_code WHERE LEFT(S.BOOK_CODE, 4) = LEFT(#{bookId}, 4) GROUP BY DS.book_code
mapper.update: update PHIEUMUON set status = 3, cancel_date = now() where ID_PHIEU_MUON = #{idPhieuMuon}
mapper.select: select USER_UID as userUid, ID_PHIEU_MUON as idPhieuMuon, STATUS as status, EXTENDED_TIMES as extended_times, CREATED_DATE as createdDate, BORROW_DATE as borrowDate, RETURN_DATE_ESTIMATE as returnDateEstimate, RETURN_UPDATE_REAL as returnUpdateReal, FINE as fine, CANCEL_DATE as cancelDate from PHIEUMUON PM WHERE PM.STATUS = #{status, jdbcType = INTEGER} and PM.USER_UID = #{userUid,jdbcType=BIGINT};
select distinct ID_PHIEU_MUON as idPhieuMuon from intern_group_one.PHIEUMUON as PM WHERE PM.STATUS = #{status, jdbcType = INTEGER} and PM.USER_UID = #{userUid,jdbcType=BIGINT};
